review_blob: This the best beer I ever had in my life ( I will admit I havent had scores of beer). I simply love this beer, it tastes like summer in your mouth ( not the sweaty parts of summer). The first time I had it was only 4ytl, it was the cheapest beer in the Cafe Ora in Adana Turkey.  But I just instantly fell in love with this beer. I must go back to Turkey

Its simply the best Turkish dark beer I had
I use to compare it to Irish stouts, but I cant do that any longer
Dont misunderstand me, If you like G*****ss you will like this beer.
